thread.title: Action on carbon emissions would be cheaper than inaction by 2040, says Citi
thread.title_full: Action on carbon emissions would be cheaper than inaction by 2040, says Citi

title: Action on carbon emissions would be cheaper than inaction by 2040, says Citi
text:
End date Action on carbon emissions would be cheaper than inaction by 2040, says Citi 
Building a low-carbon energy sector over the next 25 years would cost less than taking no action to curb greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, according to analysts at Citi. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
